sg_bmap_t Struct Reference

Graphics Bitmap. More...

#include <sg_types.h>

Detailed Description

Data structure for holding data for a bitmap.

Field Documentation

sg_size_t sg_bmap_t::columns

The number fo columns in the bitmap (used internally)
